overview:
Carl Hicks is Chief Operating Officer and Deputy Postmaster General at Earth Class Mail. Mr. Hicks is a retired U.S. Army officer and combat veteran, he served in various command and leadership positions from the infantry squad to army group level for nearly a quarter of a century with responsibility that at times ranged to thousands of soldiers. He was a decorated Airborne Ranger whose assignments were concentrated in combat arms units deployed worldwide.

After retiring from the military, Mr. Hicks served in sales and operations positions and advancing to executive VP, COO and CEO levels with full P&L responsibilities in industries as diverse as chemicals to medical devices and finance.

Mr. Hicks currently serves as the Chair-Elect of the Board of Trustees and VP of Advocacy for the Pulmonary Hypertension Association, Inc. in Silver Spring, Md.

Mr. Hicks holds a B.A. in International Studies and Russian, as well as an MBA with a focus in Management of Labor and Human Resources, (MLHR), from The Ohio State University.

Source:Earth Class Mail
